com.skyisland.questmanager.loot

Interface Lootable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NormalEnemy, StandardEnemy

    public interface Lootable
    Specifies a given object keeps a list of loot you can get from it. Example application are enemies (which have loot on drop) or random chests.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Loot> getLoot() 
      static Loot pickLoot(java.util.List<Loot> loot)
      Standard method of selecting a piece of loot from a list of loot items.

    • Method Detail

      • getLoot

        java.util.List<Loot> getLoot()

      • pickLoot

        static Loot pickLoot(java.util.List<Loot> loot)
        Standard method of selecting a piece of loot from a list of loot items. This method will return null if the argument list is either null or empty.

        The algorithm this method follows the definition of Loot's weight member; the chance a piece of loot is selected is equal to     (weight) / (Pool weight total)
